1:
God stands in the divine assembly;\q in the midst of the gods he renders judgment.
\q
2:
How long will you judge unjustly\q and show favoritism to the wicked?
\qs Selah\qs*


\q
3:
Defend the poor and fatherless;\q maintain the rights of the afflicted and destitute.
\q
4:
Rescue the poor and needy;\q take them out of the hand of the wicked.


\q
6:
I said, "You are gods,\q and all of you sons of the Most High.
\q
7:
Nevertheless you will die like men\q and fall like one of the princes."


\q
8: Arise, God, judge the earth,\q for you have an inheritance in all the nations.
